generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, adjacent to the wall, and also on the left side near the houses.
- building: Residential buildings with roofs and walls are visible on the left side of the road.
- wall: A long, solid stone wall runs along the right side of the road.
- fence: A low fence or hedge is visible along the left side of the road, separating properties.
- pole: Several tall, thin poles (likely streetlights) are visible along the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road, particularly on the right side near the wall.
- sky: A gray, overcast sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is a rider.
- car: A white car is visible in the distance on the road, and a dark-colored car is parked on the left side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
